MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW4 postcode area of Crewe , affecting properties in Middlewich Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:20 PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of complex repairs needed to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:59 PM on 19th February 2021.
